evoter.server.http.request

Class TestSubjectService

  • java.lang.Object
    • evoter.server.http.request.TestSubjectService

  • @ContextConfiguration(locations="classpath:applicationContextTest.xml")
@Transactional
@TransactionConfiguration(defaultRollback=true)
public class TestSubjectService
extends java.lang.Object
    Test for ISubjectService and SubjectService
    For all test cases , there is always a login test cases created to generate userkey
    Userkey is verified when a request is coming except login, register account or reset password
    Also, userkey is used to get user id in some test cases
    Author:
    btdiem
